gen:link.msg:message: eba_e11278_e: res_v1018 (case of country sub-regions): T 20.01, r0010, r0020, r0030 and r0040 must be all provided for c0020, c0030, c0040 and c0050 for each sheet. --> [T 20.01.w (All sheets)] exists({{r0010,c0020}}) and exists({{r0020,c0020}}) and exists({{r0030,c0020}}) and exists({{r0040,c0020}}) and exists({{r0010,c0030}}) and exists({{r0020,c0030}}) and exists({{r0030,c0030}}) and exists({{r0040,c0030}}) and exists({{r0010,c0040}}) and exists({{r0020,c0040}}) and exists({{r0030,c0040}}) and exists({{r0040,c0040}}) and exists({{r0010,c0050}}) and exists({{r0020,c0050}}) and exists({{r0030,c0050}}) and exists({{r0040,c0050}}) fails because {16 - count($a)} of the 16 mandatory fields are not provided.
